thread.section_title: LightInTheBox 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 LightInTheBox 的点评意见 | www.lightinthebox.com
thread.title: Panos Soukoulis
thread.title_full: LightInTheBox 的点评人 Panos Soukoulis

author: Panos Soukoulis
title: Panos Soukoulis
text:
Its build quality is really good and it works great. I believe that it can fit any phone since the clamp has a wide selection of positioning. Also comes with a handy cloth pouch for carrying the lenses. The macro-wide lens is perfect if you feel like your phone's camera always looks "zoomed-in". Using the macro-wide lens makes the camera see almost what you see with your bear eyes.
The 10x Telephoto Lens doesn't seem to focus correctly but it's probably my G2's bad auto-focus camera's fault.
Once again, LightInTheBox delivers a great value product.
